\subsection*{Inlets}

{ \bf inlet  number } & {\bf type} & {\bf range} & {\bf description} \\\

\hline \
% for inlet_number in sorted(inlets):
        <%
        inlet_list = inlets[inlet_number]
        col_span = len(inlet_list)
        inlet_list_count = col_span
        range_str = lambda x: ("--".join(map(str, x))) if (len(x) > 1) else "~"
        %>
    % for inlet in inlet_list:
        % if col_span == inlet_list_count:
\hline

\multirow{${col_span}}{*}{${inlet_number}} \
    % endif
& {\tt ${inlet.type()}} & ${range_str(inlet.range())} & ${inlet.text()}  \\\
            <% col_span -= 1 %>
    % endfor
% endfor

\end{tabular}
\end{table}
